mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rn, total.* from( select * from ( select r_price,h_id,h_name,h_adress,h_image,h_rate from ( select h.h_name as name, r.r_price from room r,hotel h where h.h_name = r.h_name and r.r_cheap='c') r right join (select h.* from hotel h) h on h.h_name = r.name where h_adress like '%'||#{h_adress}||'%') order by h_rate DESC) total ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
